entry.source: I have been considering leaving my home in{F801}Ginza to test my strength in new and exciting{F801}places. Since I am leaving and will no longer{F801}have a use for it, I'm going to give away this{F801}{F804,5}Black Card{F804,0} to the first person who brings{F801}me a {F804,5}Silver Coin{F804,0} to remind me of home.{F801}
